cars.name: BMW X3 latest model
cars.Description: The BMW X3 is a staple in the luxury mid-sized SUV world, and showing no sign of slowing down. Considered to be a family car, it is also considered useful in adventures

cars.name: Mazda cx-30 2020 model
cars.Description: Mazda CX-30 is a small SUV that easily satisfies our desire for fun-to-drive transportation. The CX-30 is based on the Mazda 3 compact car, which explains its athleticism and its class-above cabin furnishings

cars.name: Mitsubishi Eclipse Cross 2018 model
cars.Description: The 2018 Mitsubishi Eclipse Cross is an all-new SUV that slots between the brand's smaller Outlander Sport and bigger Outlander. Thanks to its many standard features and peppy, turbocharged engine, the new Eclipse Cross is worth a look.

cars.name: Subaru Outback 2019 model
cars.Description: The Subaru Outback is a dependable SUV. It is higly reliable for any road or weather condition.

cars.name: Toyota Hilux 8 Double Cab 2017 model
cars.Description: The face-lifted Hilux Double Cab 2.8 4X4 Legend RS AT upholds Toyotaâ€™s style, providing necessary aesthetic and functional enhancements to keep up with even next-gen competitors.
